heading: Contents of the place of assembly certificate of operation
text:
The certificate of operation shall contain the place of
   assembly certificate number, the number of persons who may legally occupy the space and any other information that the com-
   missioner may determine. Such certificate of operation shall be framed and mounted in a location that is conspicu ously visible to a
   person entering the space. For the purposes of this article a department issued place of assembly permit or place of assembly
   certificate of operation shall be valid until its expiration, at which time a new place of assembly certificate of operation shall be
   required in accordance with the provisions of this article and with the filing requirements of the department.
